channel.title: Halo 3 XB Live Question
channel.description:
I have xbox live, but only one gamertag. I want to play with a friend, and i know you can both get on the same GT but i don't know how. (Ex, The first player would be called "Ze Mouse" And the other person on the tag would be called "Ze Mouse[1]".
You can do it on Halo 2, so i know you can do it on Halo 3 :).

item.title: Halo 3 XB Live Question
item.dc:creator: @TeeBaggie TeeBaggie
item.description:
@TeeBaggie wrote:

When it asks you what account select “Guest”
And I think you sign in at the same time, or in a pre-game lobby.

Read full topic
